rdf:Description.dc:title: Legendary Tales of the Highlands, Volume I
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Thomas Dick Lauder (1784â€“1848)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org. This eBook is produced by the Online Distributed Proofreading Team at www.pgdp.net. This book is volume I of a three-volume set, which appeared in 1841. Volume II is also available in Project Gutenberg as eBook number 58931; Volume III is eBook number 59202. Scans of this work are available from the Internet Archive (Volume 1; Volume 2; Volume 3). The text is derived from these scans. An 1881 edition in one volume appeared under the title Tales of the Highlands (copy 1, 2, 3). Because of the better scan quality, the illustrations of this edition have been used for this ebook, although they where also present in the first edition.
